sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Button, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' const OrderScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const { id } = useParams() const orderDetails = useSelector((state) => state.orderDetails) const { order, loading, error} = orderDetails if (!loading) { const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2) } //Calculate Prices order.itemsPrice = addDecimals(order.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0)) } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(id)) }, [id]) return loading ? : error ? {error} : <>

Order {order._id}

{/* Shipping */}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name} {order.user.email}

Address: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {order.shippingAddress.country}

{/* Payment Method */}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod} {/* Order */}

Order Items

{order.orderItems === 0 ? Order is empty : ( {order.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} * ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} {error && {error}} } export default OrderScreen
